patterns: For how many hours your shop is available?

responses: We have branches in Vijaynagar, Indiranagar and Malleshwaram

patterns: What kinds of mopeds are there?
responses: We have Yamaha, Piaggio and Vespa mopeds. Which kind you are looking for?
We have Piaggio, Vespa and Yamaha mopeds. Which type you are looking for?

patterns: Can you give the models in yamaha?
responses: In Yamaha, we have YZF-R6, MT-07,MT-09,YZF-R15, the latest. Do you need more information?

patterns: Can you give the models in piaggio?
responses: In Piaggio, we have Typhoon 50, X9, MP3 and X10, the latest.Do you need more information?

patterns: Can you give the models in vespa?
responses: In Vespa, we have ZX, SXL 150 BS6 the latest.Do you need more information?

patterns: Give the design and colour of Yamaha models
Tell about the design and colour of Yamaha
responses: YZF-R6 is 599CC Double Disc, tubeless bike, available in Blue, Raven Black and Vivid orange costing 15 lakhs, MT-07 is 689 cc, dual channel tubeless, available in Red and costing 7.5 lakhs,MT-09 is powered by 889 cc, tubeless available in Red and costing 11.5 lakhs,YZF-R15 is 155cc, 4 stroke available in blue and costing 2 lakhs

patterns: Give the design and colour of Piaggio models
Tell about the design and colour of Piaggio
responses: Typhoon 50 is 50 CC, 4 stroke, 4-valve engine available in Blue, Raven Black and Grey costing 1.5 lakhs, X9 is 250cc, 4 stroke, available in Grey,Red, Blue and costing 4.2 lakhs, MP3 is powered by 499 cc, available in Red, Grey and costing 4.5 lakhs, X10 is 493cc, 4 stroke available in Grey and costing 1 lakh

patterns: Give the design and colour of Vespa models
Tell about the design and colour of vespa
responses: ZX is 125 CC available in Yellow costing 1.15 lakhs, SXL 150 BS6 is 150cc available in orange and costing 1.5 lakhs

responses: We are tied up with Bajaj Allianz, Kotak Mahindra, New India Assurance, Oriental, Reliance, TATA AIG. Please call our Focal Point at 1-800-23456543

patterns: Am I eligible for any lucky draw?
Do u offer Lucky draw coupons?
responses: Customers who purchase beyond 2 lakhs are eligible for lucky draw. Draw is scheduled on last Sunday of every quarter of the year.

patterns: Am I eligible for any gift?
responses: For any moped purchase, a silver coin and Titan watch is given as gift

patterns: Do you deliver the moped home?
responses: For every purchase, we assist with home delivery

patterns: How about warranty and other services?
What all would be covered after purchase?
responses: A minimum of 1 year warranty exists for all mopeds. Only major components are covered

patterns: How can I get the customer feedback?

responses: Please check in FAQ section of our website. You can also check in the '3D model display' on the 'Products List' of our website
